titles.title: Congratulating Berkeley College on the occasion of its 75th anniversary.
Congratulating Berkeley College on the occasion of its 75th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
Congratulates Berkeley College (East Orange, New Jersey) on its 75th anniversary.
Commends the President of Berkeley College, Dr. Mildred Garcia, and the administration, faculty, staff, students, and alumnae of the College for their outstanding achievements and contributions to the community.
